entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
